content_parts.title: Introduction
content_parts.content: Check out what's new in the 2024 R9 release.

content_parts.title: Improvements
_jql: project = XT AND ((issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Common' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = Improvement) OR (issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Common' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Behaviour Change' = Yes)) AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R9 (46.0.0)")

project = XT AND ((issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Common' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = Improvement) OR (issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Common' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Behaviour Change' = Yes)) AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R8 (45.0.0)")

content_parts.title: Default values assignment for stock movements

content_parts.content: To help you consider how you will manage default assignment values for stock movements, you can select default storage locations and quality control statuses in relation to item-site data on the Stock rules tab. The defaults do not yet affect any stock transactions.

Single status

Stock receipt single status includes the stock receipt status, stock detail status, and stock status.

Filtering

You can filter by status.

Additional columns for main list

You can display additional columns in the main list such as:

  • Reason
  • Status

Main list row actions

You can perform several key actions from the main list to save time, such as:

  • Set dimensions
  • Delete
To improve data management, you can manage items with sequence numbers.

content_parts.title: Other updates
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Common' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND (fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R9 (46.0.0)") OR issueFunction in linkedIssuesOf("issueFunction in x3FindContentsOfImagefixes(\"XT 2024 R9 (46.0.0)\")", "is hotfix of")) AND issue not in (XT-76932,XT-75691,XT-73827)

project = XT AND issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Common' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND (fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R8 (45.0.0)") OR issueFunction in linkedIssuesOf("issueFunction in x3FindContentsOfImagefixes(\"XT 2024 R8 (45.0.0)\")", "is hotfix of")) AND issue not in (XT-75691,XT-75308,XT-75207,XT-75006,XT-74665,XT-74212,XT-73827,XT-73533,XT-73515)

content_parts.title: Unable to reset Sage Intacct customer ID

content_parts.content: You can reset the Sage Intacct customer ID when the synchronization status is in error or not integrated. This includes resetting IDs that are too long.

content_parts.title: Total excluding tax is calculated incorrectly for partial purchase receipts

content_parts.content: When you create multiple purchase receipts from a single purchase order, the Total amount excluding tax is calculated correctly.

content_parts.title: It is possible to click the post button on a stock document again if the page is refreshed before the status is updated

content_parts.content: The post to stock button is disabled after posting and refreshing the page.
On the Purchasing tab of a supplier record, the Item column was removed.

content_parts.title: Features
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Distribution' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R9 (46.0.0)")

content_parts.content: The Sales order line inquiry features infinite scrolling, allowing for a smoother, continuous exploration of results. You can group results by criteria such as company, sales site, sold-to customer, and sales order number. And you can select one or multiple lines to export or export the entire inquiry result as a CSV file.

content_parts.content: You can add the Customer order reference on the Sales invoice and Sales shipment pages to easily link sales documents to the customer purchase order.

content_parts.title: Dimensions are not recorded for attributes Project, Employe and task in Stock receipts

content_parts.content: Dimensions are recorded for the Project, Employee, and Task attributes in stock receipts after being saved.

content_parts.title: A quantity of zero on a shipment prevents deleting the line

content_parts.content: You cannot enter a quantity of zero on a sales shipment line.

content_parts.title: Stock adjustment status does not update

content_parts.content: You can update a stock adjustment status that is posted and displays incorrectly as In progress.

content_parts.title: Unable to add new standard cost

content_parts.content: Rounding stock change values was improved so that you can add a new standard cost.

content_parts.title: Sales shipment: Incorrect status blocks allocation

content_parts.content: You can update the sales shipment status to Shipped without error.

content_parts.title: Sales shipment line error blocks posting shipments

content_parts.content: You can post a sales shipment where serial numbers were assigned to items without an error.

content_parts.title: Allocate stock displays error for purchase returns

content_parts.content: The Allocate stock action is available on a purchase return with more than 10 lines.

content_parts.title: Location mass creation error when the same storage zone is created for multiple sites

content_parts.content: You cannot use the same ID for storage zones across sites.

content_parts.title: Purchase order: Cannot modify lines when the status is variance approved

content_parts.content: You can modify the lines of a purchase invoice when the status is variance approved.

content_parts.title: Error in Purchase and Work order planning

content_parts.content: If you enter an incorrect planned order date, the error message is updated to help with date selection.

content_parts.title: Stock valuation report displays blank values

content_parts.content: The stock valuation report no longer displays blank values.

content_parts.title: Rename 'Print' button to 'Print packing slip' on Sales shipment main list

content_parts.content: Print button text updated
Stock receipt records that incorrectly display an error status can be posted correctly. The Stock status displays as Completed and the Status displays as Closed.

content_parts.title: Cannot create a partial invoice in the line panel

content_parts.content: You can create a partial purchase invoice for a purchase receipt by changing the quantity in the line panel.
When you replace an address on a purchase order, the list of available addresses displays correctly.

content_parts.title: When creating a purchase order, the order date changes incorrectly

content_parts.content: When you create a purchase order, the order date displays the date when you created the purchase order.

content_parts.title: Purchase invoice status does not update

content_parts.content: When the status of a purchase invoice does not update, you can select the status label in the header to recalculate and update the status.

content_parts.title: It is possible to post a stock document that is posted

content_parts.content: After you post a stock document, the Post stock action is no longer available.

content_parts.title: Features

content_parts.content:
In preparation for DATEV integration, the following options are ready for you to use:

Contra accounts
When you create a journal entry type, you can define a contra account type and contra account amount type that automatically populate the contra account when a journal entry is generated. Contra account information is included in the results for journal entry inquiries.

Tax information
When applicable, you can see tax details for journal entry lines for French and German legislations.

These features only apply to new journal entries.

content_parts.title: Expense or revenue account determination by tax

content_parts.content: For French and German legislations, posting class definitions include the option for a second criterion so that you have an additional level of account determination on a posting class. Instead of a single, generic account linked to an item posting class for example, you can define a second level of accounts that are only used in a sales or expense journal entry line according to the underlying tax type of the business transaction.

content_parts.content:
The Unbilled accounts receivable and payable inquiries include additional details, such as the original document date, which corresponds to the shipping date or receipt date, respectively.

These inquiries run in the background so that you can continue working. A message displays when complete.

content_parts.title: Stock receipt journal entry type posts incorrectly

content_parts.content: For US legislation, the stock receipt journal entry type posts correctly to the stock receipt account type. The 'Stock receipt' account must be set on all relevant item posting classes.

content_parts.title: Cannot modify Adjusted amount on a purchase invoice

content_parts.content: You can update the Adjusted amount on a purchase invoice when the status is Variance approved.

content_parts.title: Material tracking error in finance notification history: Default dimensions not loaded

content_parts.content: When creating a work order without dimensions or attributes from a sales order, you can update the missing information.

content_parts.title: Unbilled accounts payable and receivable errors

content_parts.content: When running the unbilled accounts payable or unbilled accounts receivable inquiries, the invoice date is taken into consideration instead of the invoice generation date.

content_parts.title: Features

content_parts.content:
You asked. We listened.

The following reports include form report templates. You can use these templates to generate any one of these forms or go to the Report templates page where you can make a copy and edit to meet your specific business needs.

  • Purchase order report
  • Sales order quote
  • Sales order confirmation
  • Sales shipment packing slip
  • Sales invoice
  • Sales credit memo
  • Proforma invoice

You have more options to create customized reports to get better insight on your data, such as:

  • A conditional block, that only includes data when specific conditions are met
  • A watermark that displays when printing a report
  • A default header and footer for list reports
  • An option to transfer reports from one tenant to another tenant from the Import and export page

content_parts.content: You can activate your Sage Intacct integration on the Option Management page. You can no longer do this on the Service options page.

content_parts.title: Features

content_parts.content:
You can create a phantom item to manage a bill of material as a subset of components to be used in work orders.

The phantom item cannot be purchased or sold. It needs to be defined before the item-site creation.

Its bill of material is exploded and used in the work order or in the finished product where it is used.

content_parts.content: For time tracking, you can set up planned run and setup times.

content_parts.title: The Allocate stock action is disabled on WO component lines

content_parts.content: The Allocate stock action on work order component lines is available.

content_parts.title: Time tracking: Cannot add a new operation to a work order

content_parts.content: You can add a new operation to a work order from the Time tracking page.

content_parts.title: Unable to exclude text components from work orders

content_parts.content: Text components can be excluded or deleted from work orders.

You can receive fewer than or more than the planned production quantity. If tracking quantities are used in production automatically, quantities are consumed in proportion to the actual quantity of the released item being tracked.

content_parts.title: Other updates

content_parts.title: New sales order line validation error

content_parts.content: When creating a sales order, you can add lines in the grid without a validation error.

content_parts.title: Unable to duplicate an item with customer links

content_parts.content: You can successfully duplicate items even if a customer is linked to the item.

content_parts.title: The pagination on a table is not working

content_parts.content: On the supplier item price list, you can view more than 10 records by using the pagination arrows on the bottom of the grid.

content_parts.title: Sales order: Cannot apply and add new line in panel

content_parts.content: You can add another line in a sales order from the side panel when you select Apply and add new.

content_parts.title: Item: Manufacturing and Documents tabs don't scroll indefinitely

content_parts.content: You can scroll through lines on these tabs as you would on other pages.

content_parts.title: Reports in English (United Kingdom) display incorrect date format

content_parts.content: The date format on reports prints according to the user's language settings.

content_parts.title: The pagination on a table is not working

content_parts.content: On the supplier item price list, you can view more than 10 records by using the pagination arrows on the bottom of the grid.

content_parts.title: Sales order: Cannot apply and add new line in panel

content_parts.content: You can add another line in a sales order from the side panel when you select Apply and add new.

content_parts.title: Item: Manufacturing and Documents tabs don't scroll indefinitely

content_parts.content: You can scroll through lines on these tabs as you would on other pages.

content_parts.title: Reports in English (United Kingdom) display incorrect date format

content_parts.content: The date format on reports prints according to the user's language settings.

content_parts.title: Other updates
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Reference Data' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND (fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R9 (46.0.0)") OR issueFunction in linkedIssuesOf("issueFunction in x3FindContentsOfImagefixes(\"XT 2024 R9 (46.0.0)\")", "is hotfix of")) AND issue not in (XT-76932,XT-75691,XT-73827)

project = XT AND issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'Reference Data' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND (fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R8 (45.0.0)") OR issueFunction in linkedIssuesOf("issueFunction in x3FindContentsOfImagefixes(\"XT 2024 R8 (45.0.0)\")", "is hotfix of")) AND issue not in (XT-75691,XT-75308,XT-75207,XT-75006,XT-74665,XT-74212,XT-73827,XT-73533,XT-73515)

content_parts.title: Customer and Supplier ID character limit exceeds the limit in Sage Intacct

content_parts.content: Business entity, Customer, Supplier, and Site IDs are limited to 20 characters.

content_parts.title: Features
_jql: project = XT AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Stock' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R9 (46.0.0)")

project = XT AND issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'Stock' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = New AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R8 (45.0.0)")

content_parts.content:
The stock journal inquiry just got easier to use and has new options:

  • No limits on the number of lines you can export. You can export all lines or a selection.
  • Additional columns are available to provide more valuable results.

content_parts.title: Improvements
_jql: project = XT AND ((issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'User Experience' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = Improvement) OR (issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'User Experience' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Behaviour Change' = Yes)) AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R9 (46.0.0)")

project = XT AND ((issuetype in (Epic, Story) AND 'X3 Release Note Status' in ('Communicated, Validated by PO/PM','Review Done') AND 'X3 Release Note Grouping' = 'User Experience' AND (statusCategory in (Done) OR status = 'Release Candidate') AND (resolution is EMPTY OR resolution = Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Epic Type' not in (Internal, Research) AND 'X3 Epic Type' = Improvement) OR (issuetype = Bug AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('To be communicated') AND 'X3 ReadMe Check' in ('Validated by PO') AND 'X3 Product Area' = 'User Experience' AND status in (Done) AND (component is EMPTY OR component not in componentMatch('^Addon*')) AND 'X3 Behaviour Change' = Yes)) AND fixVersion in x3ReleasesComponentsMatch("XT 2024 R8 (45.0.0)")

content_parts.content: To improve data sorting and visibility of manufacturing processes, you can use the Tracking date in the Production tracking line, Material tracking line, and Time tracking line inquiries.
A warning message displays when you duplicate or change the status of a document that contains an inactive item on the Purchase order, Sales order, Work order, and Bill of materials pages.

Options include:

  • Stock receipt and Stock issue available as reason code options
  • Activate or deactivate reason codes
  • Capture and create stock reasons directly on the Stock receipt and Stock issue pages

Customer and supplier sequence numbers

To improve data management, you can manage customers and suppliers with sequence numbers.

Update sequence numbers

To maintain data integrity, you can update sequence number values.
